member.name: HTTP_SERVICE_CONFIG_SSL_SNI_SET
member.summary: TheHTTP_SERVICE_CONFIG_SSL_SNI_SET structure is used to add a new Secure Sockets Layer (SSL) Server Name Indication (SNI) certificate record to the SSL SNI store or retrieve an existing record from it. It is passed to the function through the pConfigInformation parameter or to retrieve data from the function through the pOutputConfigInformation parameter when the ConfigId parameter of either function is set to HttpServiceConfigSslSniCertInfo.

member.name: HTTP_SERVICE_CONFIG_SSL_SNI_SET.KeyDesc
member.summary: An structure that identifies the SSL SNI certificate record.

member.name: HTTP_SERVICE_CONFIG_SSL_SNI_SET.ParamDesc
member.summary: An structure that holds the contents of the specified SSL SNI certificate record.
